name: SpeedSwapRun
description:
We have a twitter page that we post more frequent updates on, so follow us there to stay up to date: @SpeedSwapRun

SpeedSwapRun is a 2D platformer that focuses on speed, and creative movement.  It has been in development since early February, and is currently still in its beginning phases.  We are excited to make more progress on it this summer and will update this page when a new build of the game is ready for playtesting.
